benchmark_details.name: MCITlib (Multimodal Continual Instruction Tuning Library and Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: MCITlib is a comprehensive code library designed for continual instruction tuning of Multimodal Large Language Models, including implementations of various algorithms and careful selection of benchmarks to facilitate research.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Facilitate research in the Multimodal Continual Learning field by providing a unified implementation and evaluation protocol.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Current version limited in base model diversity and scale; experiments only on LLaV A-1.5-7B.

data.source: Benchmarks include UCIT and MLLM-DCL, selected to minimize information leakage.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated as specified in the evaluation protocol in the paper.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better performance in continual learning tasks.
